inklingMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
inklingMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

inklingMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
inklingMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
inklingMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

inklingMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
inklingMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

inklingMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
inklingMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !inklingMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

inklingMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
inklingMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !inklingMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
